responses: 2: Some important outlets routinely criticize the government but there are other important
3: All major media outlets criticize the government at least occasionally.
citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
question: Of the major print and broadcast outlets, how many routinely criticize the government?
